titles: The whole duty of a communicant eing rules and directions for a worthy receiving the most holy sacrament of the Lord's Supper. By the right reverend Father in God, John Gauden, late Lord Bishop of Exeter. He being dead yet speaketh.
author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
publisher: printed by E.R. for L.C. and Hen. Rodes next door to the Bare Tavern, near Bride-lane in Fleet-street,
notes: Caption title on p. 1 reads: The whole duty of a communicant of the sacrament in general.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
